turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello I need you to place a order for me from Starbucks for a Frappuccino please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OF course, Which starbucks should I place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Place the order at 6800 Wooster Pike, Cincinnati Ohio 45227

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time would you like to have your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As soon as possible please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size Frappuccino would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What flavor would you like today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Double Chocolaty Chip Crème.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whip cream today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any extra's you would like in your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would like raspberry syrup please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pumps would you like of the raspberry syrup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me three pumps.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the chocolate syrup on top of the frappuccino?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would. In fact have them do extra syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I have a Venti Double Chocolaty Chip Crème Frappuccino, with coconut milk, 3 pumps of raspberry syrup and extra chocoalate syrup on top. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I have placed the order and will be picking it up in 10 minutes at the Wooster pike location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for placing the order for me today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem and your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, goodbye.
